sentences.en: a lame attempt to deflect criticism
sentences.cn: 转移批评的一个无力的尝试

sentences.en: All our theories sound pretty lame.
sentences.cn: 我们的理论似乎全都站不住脚。

sentences.en: He is lame in the right leg.
He is lame of both legs.
He mumbled some lame excuse about having gone to sleep.
sentences.cn: 他含含糊糊地找了个蹩脚的借口，想要解释自己为什么睡着了。

sentences.en: He tried to justify his absence with lame excuses.
sentences.cn: 他想用站不住脚的借口为自己的缺席辩解.
他慢慢地一瘸一拐地走着.

sentences.en: I don't believe his story, It'sounds a bit lame.
sentences.cn: 我不信他讲的那一套, 他的话听起来有些靠不住.

sentences.en: Look, I'm not one of your lame ducks.
sentences.cn: 听着，我可不像你手下的那些废物。

sentences.en: Scott's muscle atrophied, his leg became stunted, and he was left lame.
sentences.cn: 斯科特的肌肉萎缩，一条腿发育不完全，成了个瘸子。

sentences.en: Sleeping too long is a lame excuse for being late.
sentences.cn: 睡得过久而迟到,这个借口站不住脚.
那个跛脚的小孩落在后面了.

sentences.en: The lame child lagged far behind.
sentences.cn: 那个跛足的孩子远远掉在后面.

sentences.en: The lame man needs a stick when he walks.
sentences.cn: 那跛脚男子走路时需借助拐棍.

sentences.en: The llama has a lame leg.
sentences.cn: 那只美洲驼有一只腿瘸.

words.tran_cn: 跛足的；僵痛的；不完全的；无说服力的

trans.tran_cn: 跛的，瘸的，僵痛的，差劲的，无说服力的，蹩脚的
trans.tran_en: a lame excuse or explanation is weak and difficult to believe
to make a person or animal unable to walk properly
